revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I have the honor to request that you will issue a warrant on the Treasurer of the United States, in favor of S. M. McKean, Esq., Disbursing Clerk, Treasury Department, for the sum of Two Thousand, two hundred and thirty one Dollars and thirty cents, ($2231:30,) and charge the same to the appropriation indicated below.
I am sir, with great respect,
Salary of the Attorney General for January 1868..$651:50
